characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the end of your Movement phase, a Warpsmith can repair a single <LEGION> VEHICLE (other than models that can Fly) within 1". That model regains D3 lost wounds. A Warpsmith can instead curse a single enemy VEHICLE within 18". Roll a D6; on a 2+ that vehicle suffers a mortal wound. A At the end of your Movement phase, a Warpsmith can repair a single (Legion) Vehicle (other than models that can Fly) within 1". That model regains D3 lost wounds. A Warpsmith can instead curse a single enemy Vehicle within 18". Roll a D6; on a 2+ that vehicle suffers a mortal wound. A VEHICLE cannot be repaired or cursed by more than one model with Master of Mechanisms in the same turn.
